item.description: [ D.O.P, Sound Postproduction ] Filming, Editing and Audio Postproduction was all done in less than one week in Italy during the Cinemadamare Filmfestival. I stood in as a D.O.P. and did the Sound postproduction. Full credits: Filmed in Milan, Italy, for the Cinemadamare Travelling Film Festival. Directed by: Gabriel Santos & Grace Viccary Written […]
item.content:encoded:
[ D.O.P, Sound Postproduction ]

Filming, Editing and Audio Postproduction was all done in less than one week in Italy during the Cinemadamare Filmfestival.
I stood in as a D.O.P. and did the Sound postproduction.

Full credits:
Filmed in Milan, Italy, for the Cinemadamare Travelling Film Festival.
Directed by: Gabriel Santos & Grace Viccary
Written By: Sergio Cutrona
Director of Photography: Arno De Facq
sound: Arno De Facq
Edited by: Gabriel Santos
Production Designer: Maxwell Mahan
1st AD: Daniela Gutierrez
1st AC: Sienna Aiello
2nd AC: Emma Younan
Girlfriend: Grace Viccary
Lover: Cristian Moriconi

item.title: Self Help
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Director Of Photography ] Self Help is story based on a r/nosleep Reddit post. It was shot in Italy in 2 days.
item.content:encoded:
[ Director Of Photography ]

Self Help is story based on a r/nosleep Reddit post. It was shot in Italy in 2 days.

item.title: A Tale Of Two Punekars
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ D.O.P. ] We follow a day in the life of a village and city girl from Pune, India, and their completely divergent relationships with water. Shot in India.
item.content:encoded:
[ D.O.P. ]

We follow a day in the life of a village and city girl from Pune, India, and their completely divergent relationships with water.
Shot in India.

item.title: Per Cosi Poco
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Camera, Sound Postproduction ] Per Cosi Poco was shot in under 1 week, from concept to finished project, at the Cinemadamare Festival in Italy. I was the main camera and audio postproduction. A lot of ADR, getting rid of small noises and trying to fix everything without having a professional audio booth to record […]
item.content:encoded:
[ Camera, Sound Postproduction ]

Per Cosi Poco was shot in under 1 week, from concept to finished project, at the Cinemadamare Festival in Italy.
I was the main camera and audio postproduction. A lot of ADR, getting rid of small noises and trying to fix everything without having a professional audio booth to record anything. Making the sound postproduction quite interesting.
It won:
Best Sound
Best Film
Best Actor
Best script

item.title: Teleurdeugd
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Directing, 2nd Camera, Editing, Audio postproduction, Effects and animation ] Teleurdeugd speaks about the omnipresent theme of depression and psychological issues without trying to moralize the audience. The film doesn’t offer answers or solutions, instead it invites to reflect on and speak about these problems. It had a theatrical release with 800 sold tickets. […]
item.content:encoded:
[ Directing, 2nd Camera, Editing, Audio postproduction, Effects and animation ]

Teleurdeugd speaks about the omnipresent theme of depression and psychological issues without trying to moralize the audience. The film doesn’t offer answers or solutions, instead it invites to reflect on and speak about these problems. It had a theatrical release with 800 sold tickets. A collaborative project with 5 people that took 2 years.
